mapper.insert: insert into FAULT (ID, FAULT_NUM, DAM_DISTANCE, ESTUARY_DISTANCE, RIVER_NAME, LEFT_BANK_X, LEFT_BANK_Y, RIGHT_BANK_X, RIGHT_BANK_Y, LEFT_BANK_ELEVATION, RIGHT_BANK_ELEVATION, LOCATION_RESERVOIR, TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faultNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damDistance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{estuaryDistance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{riverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leftBankX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{leftBankY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rightBankX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rightBankY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{leftBankElevation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rightBankElevation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{locationReservoir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update FAULT set FAULT_NUM = #{faultNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAM_DISTANCE = #{damDistance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ESTUARY_DISTANCE = #{estuaryDistance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RIVER_NAME = #{riverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEFT_BANK_X = #{leftBankX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LEFT_BANK_Y = #{leftBankY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RIGHT_BANK_X = #{rightBankX,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RIGHT_BANK_Y = #{rightBankY,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LEFT_BANK_ELEVATION = #{leftBankElevation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RIGHT_BANK_ELEVATION = #{rightBankElevation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LOCATION_RESERVOIR = #{locationReservoir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, FAULT_NUM, DAM_DISTANCE, ESTUARY_DISTANCE, RIVER_NAME, LEFT_BANK_X, LEFT_BANK_Y, RIGHT_BANK_X, RIGHT_BANK_Y, LEFT_BANK_ELEVATION, RIGHT_BANK_ELEVATION, LOCATION_RESERVOIR, TYPE from FAULT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, FAULT_NUM, DAM_DISTANCE, ESTUARY_DISTANCE, RIVER_NAME, LEFT_BANK_X, LEFT_BANK_Y, RIGHT_BANK_X, RIGHT_BANK_Y, LEFT_BANK_ELEVATION, RIGHT_BANK_ELEVATION, LOCATION_RESERVOIR, TYPE from FAULT
